title: MSME Ministry’s Tech Centres begin recovery from Covid slump as revenue, number of trainees jump in FY22 - The Financial Express
content: MSME Ministry’s Tech Centres begin recovery from Covid slump as revenue, number of trainees jump in FY22  The Financial Express
description: Skill, labour, talent for MSMEs: To augment the network of 18 TCs, the government had launched the Technology Centre Systems Programme (TCSP) in January 2015 to set up 15 additional TCs with a total cost of Rs 2,200 crore including Rs 20 crore assistance from the World Bank.
